casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Edward GODWIN, III 167PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2016 Mr. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, Attorney at Law, For Godwin, William Edward (III). Ms. Teresa L. Townsend, Raleigh, Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney Generals, Mr. R. Andrew Murray, Charlotte, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of October 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
